General.Message: Caller advised a possible Vehicular Kidnapping
Do a ~g~traffic stop~w~ on the ~o~suspected vehicle~w~, respond Code 3.

Infos.Info: The vehicle model is a ~b~black Granger SUV~w~.

Conversation1.Dialogue: ~y~You~w~: Hello, I'm an officer from the local police department.
~o~Driver~w~: I can see that. What's the reason for the stop?
~y~You~w~: We've got a call about your vehicle. Who else is with you?
~o~Driver~w~: Just my boss in the left rear. You don't need to know more.
~y~You~w~: Well, that's up to me who I'm talking to.
~o~Left rear passenger~w~: Dude, don't mess with us, we haven't done anything!
~y~You~w~: Sir, I'm not talking to you, let me talk to the lady, now.
~y~You~w~: M'am, how are you doing? Do you know those gentlemen?
The woman appears to ~r~shake~w~ and feel ~r~uncomfortable~w~.
~o~Left rear passenger~w~: See, there's nothing wrong here, stop waisting your time!
There seems to be something not right, get a backup unit.
~y~You~w~: Alright, I want everyone to step out one by one...

OutcomeVehiclePursuit.Dialogue: ~g~Chase down~w~ both suspects, call for ~b~backup~w~ eventually!

OutcomeFootPursuit.Dialogue: ~g~Chase down~w~ both suspects, call for ~b~backup~w~ eventually!

VictimTalk.Dialogue: Go to the ~g~victim~w~ and make sure she's ~g~fine~w~.
~g~Victim~w~: Oh my god, thank you so much! I was so afraid!
~y~You~w~: Do you know the men who kidnapped you?
~g~Victim~w~: No, I've never seen them! They told me they were gonna sell me!
~y~You~w~: They are behind bars now. Do you need medical assistance?
~g~Victim~w~: No, I'm fine, just a bit shaky right now. Thank you very much for your help!
~y~You~w~: Glad your fine, make sure to go home safely!
Choose, if you want a ~y~taxi~w~, ~g~Uber~w~ to pick her up or send her ~b~on her way~w~.
